title: Warp Beast
description: Large, black, six-legged, semi-intelligent monsters. Look similar to panthers with a tentacle growing from each front shoulder. Tentacles ridged with razor-sharp edges.
extras: Displacement: Appear 3’ from actual location: attackers suffer –2 to hit.	Save bonus: +2 to all saves.	Hate blink dogs: Always attack them and their companions.
